# How Many Cold Emails Should I Send Per Day?

> ## Documentation Index
> Fetch the complete documentation index at: https://howmanycoldemailsperday.com/llms.txt
> Use this file to discover all available pages before exploring further.

## Quick Answer

Send 50–100 cold emails per day per mailbox, using 3–5 separate domains, to maintain inbox deliverability and avoid spam filters.

---

# How Many Cold Emails Should I Send Per Day?

Send **50–100 cold emails per day per mailbox**, using **3–5 separate domains**, to maintain inbox deliverability and avoid spam filters.

## Sending Limits by Provider

| Provider | Hard Limit | Safe Limit | Recommended |
|----------|------------|------------|-------------|
| Gmail (free) | 500/day | 100/day | 50-75/day |
| Google Workspace | 2000/day | 500/day | 75-100/day |
| Outlook (free) | 300/day | 100/day | 50-75/day |
| Microsoft 365 | 10,000/day | 1000/day | 75-100/day |

## Scaling Formula

- **Emails per day** = Mailboxes × 50-100
- **Mailboxes needed** = Target volume ÷ 75
- **Domains needed** = Mailboxes ÷ 2-3

Example: 500 emails/day = 7 mailboxes across 3 domains

---

## Blog Posts

### Cold Email Sending Limits: Data-Backed Guide for 2026
URL: https://howmanycoldemailsperday.com/blog/cold-email-sending-limits-data/

Per-mailbox limits by provider. Gmail: 500/day limit, recommend 50-75. Outlook: 300/day limit, recommend 50-100. Google Workspace: 2000/day limit, recommend 75-100.

---

### Cold Email Infrastructure Guide: Domains, Mailboxes, and Sending Limits (2026)
URL: https://howmanycoldemailsperday.com/blog/cold-email-infrastructure-2026/

Complete infrastructure setup. Domain-to-mailbox ratios, warm-up schedules, rotation strategies, monitoring tools.

---

### Cold Email Warm-Up: How Long Before You Can Send at Scale
URL: https://howmanycoldemailsperday.com/blog/cold-email-warm-up-guide/

Warm-up timeline: Week 1: 10-20/day. Week 2: 20-40/day. Week 3: 40-70/day. Week 4+: 70-100/day. Engagement signals critical.

---

## Tools

### Cold Email Volume Calculator
URL: https://howmanycoldemailsperday.com/tools/cold-email-volume-calculator/

Calculate safe sending volume based on domains, mailboxes, and warm-up status.

---

### Spam Word Checker
URL: https://howmanycoldemailsperday.com/tools/spam-word-checker/

Check email for spam trigger words that hurt deliverability.

---

### Subject Line Analyzer
URL: https://howmanycoldemailsperday.com/tools/subject-line-analyzer/

Analyze subject line for spam triggers, length, personalization opportunities.
